name: Tu Lan Cave - So you think you could trek
description: Tu Lan cave system comprises of Tu Lan cave, Ken cave, Chuot cave, Kim cave, and Song cave is located at Tan Hoa village, Minh Hoa district of Quang Binh province. The system spreads through 4 valleys covered with primary forests and unnamed rivers. There are magnificent stalagmites and stalactites inside the cave, together with small waterfalls and underground rivers making Tu Lan a unique spot for both sightseeing and adventure.
